ygData.subject: RE: Lag at the Bazaar
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t think anyone on here has lashed out at Verant but I know several have during game play, that comment was mostly meant for them. It s a new thing so yea
ygData.messageBody:
I don't think anyone on here has lashed out at Verant but I know several
have during game play, that comment was mostly meant for them.
It's a new thing so yea people are going to flock to it. I personally
haven't been there yet. I was told you need the Luclin expansion for it.
Don't have that one, heck I just picked up the Ruins expan yesterday!
Lol!
I have to admit I personally am enjoying the little amount of people in
the game, I'm getting a hold of a lot of great stuff and making some
decent plat amounts. I've been able to get all the items I need for my
quests and so forth. Today I was surprised and happy to see a few people
running around in Steamfront.

Anyway back to my quests!

-----Original Message-----

Message: 5
Date: Sun, 28 Jul 2002 11:11:03 -0500
From: "Su" <suceress@...>
Subject: Re: Lag at the Bazaar

I don't think anyone has said this was Verant's fault. I think we all
realize that anytime you have a large number of people someplace it is
going
to zone. It is kindof amazing to realize that there are 200+ people in
one
zone though. I don't think people expected to see that many in one zone.
Hopefully the lag will die down some as the novelty of the new features
start to fade. Who knows though, maybe they might have to make a
bazaar2.
Until then, some of us with really pathetic 'net connections will have
to
wait until the fervor dies down.
And nah. You're not going to get flamed. You're just stating the facts.
:-)
luv,

-Su
